trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_SEQ_00<tab>Maru looks genuinely worried.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_TODO_00<tab>Search for the missing Rider.
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_TODO_01<tab>Retrieve the fallen cargo.
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_TODO_02<tab>Return the fallen cargo within the time limit.
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_TODO_03<tab>Report back to Maru.
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_MARU_000_001<tab>We might have trouble, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─one of our Riders has gone missin'.
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_MARU_000_002<tab>Last we heard from him, he was headin' back here from Palaka's Stand, but that was some time ago.
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_MARU_000_003<tab>You think you could spare a moment to join our search? We've covered the ground between here and the Wakeful Torana so far, but beyond that...
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_WORRIEDARKASODARA04554_000_010<tab>Oh, blessed be! Someone came lookin'!
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_WORRIEDARKASODARA04554_000_011<tab>You won't believe the beast we just ran into. Ugliest thing I've seen since the Final Days...
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_WORRIEDARKASODARA04554_000_012<tab>Well, we spanked away like our skins depended on it, but my delivery got jostled outta the cart.
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_WORRIEDARKASODARA04554_000_013<tab>To make matters worse, when I pull 'round to fetch it, my wheel slams into a rock, an' now I'm spinnin' six ways to nowhere!

TEXT_BANARK104_04554_WORRIEDARKASODARA04554_000_014<tab>My girl was in hippo hysterics─I had to cut her loose to stop her bellowin'. I hate to put you out like this, but you think you could lend me a hand an' bring me my cargo?
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_WORRIEDARKASODARA04554_000_015<tab>It's just one wooden crate. I think I spotted it by that boulder over there.
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_WORRIEDARKASODARA04554_000_016<tab>Shapin' up to be one of those days, I'm afraid─but knowin' that cargo's safe would make all the difference.
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Return the fallen cargo to the harried Rider's cart before your arms give out.
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>You will have three minutes to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_WORRIEDARKASODARA04554_000_030<tab>That's it! Thank the Sisters. And you!
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_WORRIEDARKASODARA04554_000_031<tab>I'll head home as soon as we're ready to ride. Let Maru know we're alright, will you?
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_WORRIEDARKASODARA04554_000_032<tab>I've still gotta check the cart an' coax my girl back under the yoke─tell Maru we'll be on our way shortly, yeah?
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_MARU_000_040<tab>So that's what happened! Thank the Sisters that everyone's alright...
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_MARU_000_041<tab>Our Riders are usually pretty good at avoidin' the nastier beasties, but a jungle's still a jungle... Sounds like our carts could use some adjustments, too...
TEXT_BANARK104_04554_MARU_000_042<tab>Anyroad, I'll mention it to the boss. Thanks for bein' a pal, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
